articles.title: Getting splashy at Iguazu Falls
articles.description: South Bay travelers share trip tips from their recent foray to Argentina's Iguazu Falls.
articles.content: Bay Area readers have traveled to destinations near and far-flung over the last year, exploring Scottish castles, hiking to Northern California waterfalls and sampling Parisian croissants. Now they’re sharing their travel tales and offering practical... [1768 chars]

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Cameron Norrie to win Argentina Open title
articles.description: The World No. 2 overwhelmed second seed Cameron Norrie 6-3, 7-5 to claim his seventh ATP Tour title.
articles.content: The World No. 2 Carlos Alcaraz on Sunday produced a stunning performance to overwhelm second seed Cameron Norrie in the final to claim the Argentina Open title. The World No. 2 overwhelmed Cameron Norrie, a Wimbledon semi-finalist last year, 6-3, 7-5... [1841 chars]

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz wins Argentina Open after three-month injury layoff
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz capped off a stunning return from injury as he defeated Cameron Norris 6-3 7-5 to win the Argentina Open on Sunday.
articles.content:
CNN —
Carlos Alcaraz capped off a stunning return from injury as he defeated Cameron Norris 6-3 7-5 to win the Argentina Open on Sunday.

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz hails dream return from injury after Argentina Open triumph
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz enjoyed a dream return to action after more than three months out due to abdominal and hamstring injuries as the world number two claimed the Argentina Open title on Sunday by beating Cameron Norrie 6-3 7-5 in the final.

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz Captures Argentina Open Title after Four-month Injury Lay-off
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz defeated Cameron Norrie 6-3, 7-5 to clinch the Argentina Open title, his first triumph in four months
articles.content:
Carlos Alcaraz marked his return to action for the first time in almost four months with a 6-3, 7-5 win over Cameron Norrie in the final of the Argentina Open on Sunday.

articles.title: Argentina Open: Carlos Alcaraz defeats Cameron Norrie in straight sets to be crowned champion
articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz took just over an hour-and-a-half to defeat Britains Cameron Norrie 6-3, 7-5 to win the Argentina Open; It is Alcarazs first title of 2023 after four months out with abdominal and leg injuries
articles.content:
Britain's Cameron Norrie lost in straight sets to top seed Carlos Alcaraz in the final of the Argentina Open.

articles.title: Carlos Alcaraz beats Cameron Norrie in Argentina Open final
articles.description: Top-seeded Carlos Alcaraz won his first title since his milestone US Open triumph by beating Cameron Norrie in straight sets at the Argentina Open on Sunday.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina -- Top-seeded Carlos Alcaraz won his first title since his milestone US Open triumph by beating Cameron Norrie in straight sets at the Argentina Open on Sunday.
